div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1320 Calymna, Caria, 1932-1934 (191) Burial: 200-175 B.C. (M) Contents: 92 AR, 54 AE Calymna: 6 didr.; 1 dr. Cos: 71 dr.; 10 hemidr.; 54 AE Rhodes: 1 dr.; 3 hemidr. Disposition: London and Oxford parts Robinson, NC 1936, pp. 190-4 Kroll, ANSMN 11 (1964), pp. 83 f.
